items.sentence: The bus driver slammed on the brakes and three of the passengers who were standing suffered minor injuries.

Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for the rest of his life.

Tom\'s French teacher called his mother to let her know that Tom had skipped his French class several times.
Someone told me that people with type O blood attract more mosquitoes than people with any other blood type.
